name: flash-cannon
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it all at once. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. This may also lower the target’s defensive stats.
